#include <iostream>
#include <string>
using namespace std;
int dp[5000000];
int main()
{
   long long int t,ans = 0,prv = 0,p,i;
   // cin>>t;
    while(1)
    {
        t--;
        string s;
        cin>>s;
        if ( s == "End")break;
        p = 0;
        cout<<"0";
        for ( i = 1; i < s.size();)
        {
            if ( s[i] == s[p])
            {

                p++;
                dp[i] = p;
                cout<<" "<<p;
                i++;

               // continue;
            }else
            {
                if (p == 0)
                {
                    cout<<" 0";
                    dp[i] = 0;
                    i++;

                }
                else
            {

                p = dp[p-1];
               // continue;
            }

            }

            //cout<<" "<<p;
        }
        cout<<endl;
    }

}
